body: No tagged release of OpenMPI 4.0.x supports UCX 1.7. [OpenMPI devs blame UCX's unstable API](https://github.com/open-mpi/ompi/issues/7128). Unfortunately some software installs UCX 1.7, such as Mellanox OFED drivers. Why a major network driver distribution wasn't regression tested for compatibility with a flagship communication library remains a mystery.
title: Patch for OpenMPI 4.0.x + UCX 1.7
